Trade/Device Name(s): GlucoDr™M auto Blood Glucose Monitoring System
GlucoDr™ auto Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Methodologies: Measurement of electrical currents by reaction of glucose with reagents on electrode strip
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for GlucoDr™M auto Blood Glucose Monitoring System for quantitative measurement of glucose in whole blood by electrochemical detection
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for in vitro quantitative measurement of glucose in venous, arterial and capillary whole blood at various body sites for monitoring effectiveness of diabetes control, not for diagnosis or screening nor use on neonates
